edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom

Class PersistedAtomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom.PersistedAtomManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomManager

    public class PersistedAtomManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements AtomManager
    Implements the AtomManager with a twist: this AtomManager will only return RandomVariableAtoms that were persisted in the Database at instantiation.

    All other types of Atoms are returned normally.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PersistedAtomManager(Database db)
      Constructs a PersistedAtomManager with a built-in set of all the database's persisted RandomVariableAtoms.

        public GroundAtom getAtom(Predicate p,
                 GroundTerm... arguments)
        Description copied from interface: AtomManager
        Returns the GroundAtom for the given Predicate and GroundTerms.

        This method must call Database.getAtom(Predicate, GroundTerm...) to actually retrieve the GroundAtom.

        Specified by:
